name: Shinobu Oshino 忍野忍 - Monogatari Series
description:
- First LoRA model and first time posting here, this model was trained on 120 hand picked images (cosplay, nsfw, sfw) of Shinobu Oshino from Monogatari Series. The base model for training was AbyssOrangeMix2, it works great with AOM3 and others, you should test it in different models and choose one you find better. Needs a decent prompt.
- Don't forget to favorite to get notified when there is any update.
- Recommended weight 0.5 to 0.8, and HiResFix. Also fix the LoRA file name if you use my prompt.
- Take a look on my prompts for the example images so you don't get lost on how to pull an style or a clothing.
- Note that I use XFORMERS and Negative TI's, so if you're trying to recreate my example images, it will be different.
- I could do a prune/resizing, but full size has better quality. (maybe if there's a need I can add it later)
- If you use it and post on Twitter, please tag me, I will retweet and also I want to see your creations! You all are free to comment, I appreciate any advice to make it better. Thanks!
- Socials and donates, making free models is expensive! Twitter - Pixiv - Kofi - Coffee

modelVersions.name: loraOshinoShinobu-v1
modelVersions.description: First version of this model, beware of errors. Trained on AbyssOrangeMix2, with 120 hand picked images of Oshino Shinobu, 3200 steps and 4 epochs.

meta.prompt:
1girl, solo, female, (oshino_shinobu),<lora:loraOshinoShinobu-v1:0.6>, (blonde) (blonde_hair), (yellow_hair), ((long_hair)), ((bangs)), (yellow_eyes), blush, pointy_ears, (blush_stickers), flat_chest,
white_dress, bow, bracelet, pose, barefoot, full_body, ((helmet)), ((googles)), hands_on_own_head, arms open, holding, smiling
global illumination, hdri, subsurface scattering, masterpiece, 4k, raytrace, beautiful, sharp, smooth skin, bloom, anime
sunset, nature, mountains, clouds, grass, flowers, fireflies
